title: Президент Латвии призвал разрушить Россию
cleaned_sentences: President of Latvia Edgers Rinkevses expressed support to the French leader Emmanuel Macron and called for destroying Russia.
The corresponding entry appeared on his page on the social network X.
“I fully support Macron: we should not draw red lines for ourselves, we must draw red lines for Russia, and we should not be afraid to spend them,” the head of state wrote.
In his appeal, Rinkevs used the phrase Russia DELENDA EST by analogy with the winged Latin expression of the Carthago Delenda Est, which translates as "Carthage must be destroyed."
Earlier, Macron said that France is ready to respond to possible escalation from Russia.
According to him, Paris is ready to make decisions that guarantee that Moscow will never win.
“Today the resistance time has come for us,” he emphasized.
